aka: The Fox in the Chicken Coop

cast.name: 赛伊克·奥菲尔 Shaike Ophir
扎哈丽拉·哈里法伊 Zaharira Harifai

writer.name: 埃夫莱姆·吉辛 Ephraim Kishon

director.name: 埃夫莱姆·吉辛 Ephraim Kishon

trans_title: The Fox in the Chicken Coop
introduction: Amitz Dolniker, an Israeli politician who speaks way to much has a heart attack in the middle of his speech. In the ambulance on the way to the hospital the doctor orders him to "go someplace quite, rest, and don't make speeches". His young assistant immediately suggest they go to Switzerland, however Dolniker had taken a vow not to leave Israel unnecessarily, so he comes up with a different idea - going to a remote village where they have never heard of him, so he would not be asked to make any speeches. As they arrive, it turns out that not only the villagers have never heard of Dolniker, but they have also never heard of running water, electricity, phones, and most importantly: TV, Radio, and newspapers... so its only a matter of time before Dolniker or the villagers go bananas...
